lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Wholly-owned and joint venture companies also did well apart from timber, building supplies and real estate, which returned below-budget profits due to the housing downturn.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Adsteam said its diverse industrial interests generally performed well and its results, as the ultimate holding company and beneficiary, reflected this solid performance.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The issue will be underwritten by <Morgan Grenfell Australia Ltd> and <McCaughan Dyson Ltd> apart from the shares to be taken up by Adsteam's associate and largest shareholder, department store retailer <David Jones Ltd>.
